name: Building Block Heroes
description: Building Block Heroes is a puzzle block platformer (with boss fights!) in which you use coloured blocks to build pathways around each level. Grab a friend and construct your own means to save the Jollyfolk!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Anything will do
